director.name: 弗洛莉娅·塞吉斯蒙迪 Floria Sigismondi

introduction: Tricky's first DVD collects fourteen videos and a documentary from England's number-one trance-punk rude boy.Aftermath - Directed by Mike Lipscombe, produced by Nick Verden, 1993.Ponderosa - Directed by Mike Lipscombe, produced by Juliet Jordan, 1994.Overcome - Directed by Mike Lipscombe, produced by Will Oakley, 1995.Black Steel - Directed by Mike Lipscombe, produced by Ali Buttle, 1995.Hell Is Round The Corner - Directed by Stephane Sednaoui, produced by Line Potmyr, 1995.Pumpkin - Directed by Stephane Sednaoui, produced by Kirsten Syme, 1995.Christiansands - Directed by Shawn Mortensen, produced by Corina Conti, 1996.Tricky Kid - Directed by Arthur Jafa, produced by Melinda Nugent, 1996.Makes Me Wanna Die - Directed by Floria Sigismondi, produced by Kelly Norris, 1997.Broken Homes - Directed by Theodore Witcher, produced by Phillipa Davis, 1998.Money Greedy - Directed by Theodore Witcher, produced by Phillipa Davis, 1998.For Real - Directed by Stephane Sednaoui, produced by Stephanie Bruni-Malkin, 1999.Naked & Famous (Documentary) - Directed and produced by Mark Kidel, 1997.
